Visualize Insper Color Palettes

Source: R/utils.R
show_insper_palette.Rd

Display color palettes used by scale_*_insper_*() functions. To see individual colors, use show_insper_colors.

Usage

show_insper_palette(palette = "main")

Arguments

palette

Character. Name of palette. Use list_palettes to see available options. Default "main".

Value

A ggplot2 object

Details

This function visualizes the palettes that are used by ggplot2 scale functions like scale_fill_insper_d and scale_color_insper_c.

Available palettes: main, reds, oranges, teals, grays, red_teal, red_teal_ext, diverging, bright, contrast, categorical, accent_red, accent_teal, and more.

See also

list_palettes, insper_pal, show_insper_colors

Other colors: get_insper_colors(), get_palette_colors(), insper_pal(), list_palettes(), show_insper_colors()

Examples

# Show default palette
show_insper_palette()


# Show specific palettes
show_insper_palette("reds")

show_insper_palette("red_teal")
